title: Swig & Swine
description: BBQ brunch in Park Circle. Weekend brunch Sat-Sun 10am-2pm with smoked meat eggs benedict, brisket hash, and boozy cocktails. Laid-back patio vibes.
searchHint: Swig and Swine 1217 Savannah Hwy North Charleston SC

title: Park Pizza & Brewing Co
description: Park Circle's go-to for weekend brunch pizzas. Sat-Sun 10am-2pm with breakfast pies, mimosa pitchers, and house-brewed beers. Kid-friendly.
searchHint: Park Pizza Brewing Co 1063 East Montague Ave North Charleston SC

title: The Barrel
description: Cozy Park Circle restaurant with weekend brunch Sat-Sun 10am-2pm. Southern-inspired dishes, shrimp and grits, French toast, and a solid Bloody Mary bar.
searchHint: The Barrel 1859 Summerville Ave North Charleston SC

title: Sesame Burgers & Beer
description: Weekend brunch with gourmet burgers and creative brunch cocktails Sat-Sun 10am-2pm. Famous for their loaded breakfast burgers and truffle fries.
searchHint: Sesame Burgers Beer 4726 Spruill Ave North Charleston SC

title: La Nortena
description: Authentic Mexican brunch in Park Circle. Weekend brunch Sat-Sun 10am-3pm with huevos rancheros, chilaquiles, and fresh-squeezed margaritas.
searchHint: La Nortena 4705 Spruill Ave North Charleston SC
